title: User Document Schema
description: Schema for a user document stored in the Firestore 'users' collection.

birthday.description: The user's birthdate as a timestamp in ISO 8601 format (RFC 3339).

created_time.description: Timestamp of when the user document was created.

display_name.description: The display name of the user, shown in the app UI.

hometown.description: The user's hometown, as a plain text string.

photo_url.description: URL pointing to the user's profile photo stored in Firebase Storage or elsewhere.

uid.description: The unique identifier assigned to the user (usually by Firebase Authentication).
